programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Pachy-makit olivat punaturkkisia, lahes isojen apinoiden kokoisia jattilaisia. Forrest etsii puiden latvustosta todisteita, etta laji on edelleen hengissa.

programme.title: Hirvio sisallani
programme.desc: Mystinen tulehdus saa jalkapalloilijan polvilleen. Loiset syovat naisen silmamunan. Merielavat hyokkaavat satamamestarin paalle!

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikemies Brad Jennings tilaa uuden toimistonsa loppusilaukseksi kolme akvaariota. Niissa nakyy lisahuoneita, joista yhdessa on jopa toimiva takka!

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: Cats of Claw Hill
programme.desc: Animal Planetin uusi saippuadokumenttisarja valottaa kotikissojen yksityista maailmaa kiehtovasti seuraten kissojen arkielamaa "kissaperspektiivista".

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Mireya ja Ronny palaavat paikkaan, missa he kuulivat vihellysta ja nakivat hehkuvat silmat. Mireya suostuu olemaan houkuttimena saadakseen isojalan esiin.

programme.title: Hirvio sisallani
programme.desc: Mystinen tulehdus saa jalkapalloilijan polvilleen. Loiset syovat naisen silmamunan. Merielavat hyokkaavat satamamestarin paalle!

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 8, osa 9. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert hoitaa vihaista Bunker-vompattia. Jattianakonda Nikilla on edessaan muuttopaiva. Terri hoitaa satoja sateenkaarilureja, jotka ovat loukkaantuneet raekuurossa.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia. (The Zoo, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Dan McKernan jatti kaupunkielaman taakseen, muutti Michiganin maaseudulle ja perusti maatilalleen elainsuojelualueen. Sarjassa otetaan katsaus tilan sydanta lammittaviin pelastustarinoihin ja jokapaivaiseen elamaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 4 osa 1/10. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, Iso-Britannia, 2017)

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Maailmanmestarinyrkkeilija Fernando Vargas tilaa nyrkkeilyhanskan muotoisen akvaarion harjoitussalilleen Las Vegasiin. Tuleeko siita taystyrmays?

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kamppailu elamasta. Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat pyrkivat saamaan oikeutta laiminlyodylle koiralle ja sen pennulle, ja tutkija Casadevall rientaa auttamaan Miamin kuumuudessa karsivia koiria.

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Dokumentaarisessa sarjassa seurataan Houstonin elainsuojeluyhdistyksen tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elainten hyvaksi.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Syvalla Louisianan eramaassa rapukalastaja saadaan kiinni varastamassa ansoja ja metsastaja jaa kiinni laittoman peuran kanssa. Lisaksi agentit pelastavat loukkaantuneen kotkan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Madagaskarin sademetsassa tiimi etsii lahes nakymatonta otusta, nimittain pantterikameleonttia. Matelija nayttaa kokeiden perusteella uhmaavan fysiikan lakeja.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa kaksi puumajaa 13-vuotiaalle esiintyja Grace VanderWaalille. Tiimi rakentaa boheemin klubitalon ja ikkunaseinaisen taideateljeen.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Villalobos keraa varoja pelastuskeskukselle jarjestamalla Halloween-juhlat. Vanha ystava palaa takaisin, ja Lizzy joutuu vaikeaan irtokoiran pelastustehtavaan keskella yota.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Nelja taistelevaa kissaa on jakanut eraan huushollin kahtia. Kissalan reviiririidat ovat pakottaneet kaksi kissaa elamaan vuosia erakkoina eristyksessa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert hoitaa vihaista Bunker-vompattia. Jattianakonda Nikilla on edessaan muuttopaiva. Terri hoitaa satoja sateenkaarilureja, jotka ovat loukkaantuneet raekuurossa.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 4 osa 1/10. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, Iso-Britannia, 2017)

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perheen kaksi nigerialaista kaapiovuohta aiheuttaa sekasortoa takapihalla! Antonio tekee pihasta hauskan vuohien leikkikentan, johon kuuluu mm. kiipeilytorni.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Talven tuloon on enaa viikkoja, ja perheet yrittavat tayttaa ruokavarastojaan. Heimo ja Charlie pelkaavat, ettei heilla ole tarpeeksi lihaa talveksi.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: The Browns begin an ambitious barn build, the key to Billys grand vision. Plus, Noah returns, reuniting the entire wolfpack for the first time since Alaska.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Syvalla Louisianan eramaassa rapukalastaja saadaan kiinni varastamassa ansoja ja metsastaja jaa kiinni laittoman peuran kanssa. Lisaksi agentit pelastavat loukkaantuneen kotkan.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Jaksossa nahdaan ruokaa varasteleva ja taloa tuhoava kissa, jaakaapissa tuhoa aiheuttava kani ja koira, joka jahtaa jaateloautoa niin kauan, etta se saa mehujaatelon.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 4/6. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Hirvio sisallani
programme.desc: Kausi 7, osa 3. Loiset eivat tunne armoa, ja tama sarja paljastaa jarkyttavia tositarinoita nakymattomien petojen kanssa kamppailevista ihmisista. Loishyokkayksen kohteeksi joutuneet kertovat kokemuksistaan, joita havainnollistetaan draaman keinoin. Pedot vaanivat mita odottamattomimmissa paikoissa. Kun tavarankuljettajan silmanymparys turpoaa, nakokyky katoaa ja kipu pistaa syvalle kuin veitsi, laakarit yrittavat kiireesti etsia syyta. Lihansyojaloiset asettuvat nuoren tyton paanahkaan asumaan. Tappava tunkeutuja tekee rentouttavasta lomamatkasta painajaisen. Naiden ja muiden tapausten kautta tutkitaan, miten loiset paasevat pesiytymaan ihmisen sisuksiin, ja milla keinoilla laakarit yrittavat saada ne hallintaansa. (Monsters Inside Me, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Maailmanmestarinyrkkeilija Fernando Vargas tilaa nyrkkeilyhanskan muotoisen akvaarion harjoitussalilleen Las Vegasiin. Tuleeko siita taystyrmays?

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Manaatin pelastus. Manaatin rapylan dramaattinen pelastus paljastaa salaisuuden. Tutkija Casadevall etsii salametsastajia, joiden hyokkayksissa on kuollut useita karjaelaimia.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kamppailu elamasta. Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat pyrkivat saamaan oikeutta laiminlyodylle koiralle ja sen pennulle, ja tutkija Casadevall rientaa auttamaan Miamin kuumuudessa karsivia koiria.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 8, osa 11. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Terri tarkastaa pahoin loukkaantuneen Daniel-vallabin, joka ei pysty kavelemaan. Robert ja Chandler hyppaavat hetkeksi aalloille ennen uuden komodonvaraanin noutamista.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalamies ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade etsii Italian Garda-jarvelta 1500-luvun hirviokalaa. Millaisia salaisuuksia jarven pinnan alle katkeytyy?

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff ja tiimi tarjoavat ilmaista apua Meksikon koyhille perheille. Yhdessa tyontayteisessa viikossa he ehtivat hoitaa satoja avun tarpeessa olevia elaimia.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Howie Mandel tilaa uuden akvaarion, talla kertaa yllatykseksi agenttinsa yritykselle. Jo olemassa oleva akvaario tarvitsee paivitysta.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elaman jano. Sarjassa seurataan Miami-Daden poliisilaitoksen elainpalveluyksikon tutkijoita taistelussa elaimiin kohdistuvaa julmuutta vastaan.

programme.title: Vet Life: Bonus Tails
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Blue hoitaa kiireellista tapausta, jossa pesukarhu on hyokannyt pitbullterrierin paalle. Elainlaakari Ross hoitaa vihaista frettia. Sitten on ison ilmoituksen vuoro!

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Varomattoman metsastajan ampumista valtatiella tutkitaan. Poliisit tarkkailevat kahdesta laittomasta peurankaadosta epailtya miesta. Ankanmetsastajia kuulustellaan hairinnasta.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Metsanvartija Marshall johtaa salametsastystutkimuksia. Richard kay laittoman kaarmeenkasvattajan luona. Gould ja Hickerson yrittavat pelastaa loukkaantuneen pelikaanin.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 1 alkaa uusintana. Osa 1. Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa. (Treetop Cat Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa. (Treetop Cat Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Hiljattain kuolleen Villalobosin tyontekija Muttin perhe tapaa koiran, jonka mies oli valinnut heille. Tia ja M2 jahtaavat villihanhia lahella koulurakennusta.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Missy-kissa repii aidin ja tyttaren erilleen ja yrittaa viela tappaa perheen toisen kissan, Fluffyn. Jackson kiirehtii hatiin.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Terri tarkastaa pahoin loukkaantuneen Daniel-vallabin, joka ei pysty kavelemaan. Robert ja Chandler hyppaavat hetkeksi aalloille ennen uuden komodonvaraanin noutamista.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff ja tiimi tarjoavat ilmaista apua Meksikon koyhille perheille. Yhdessa tyontayteisessa viikossa he ehtivat hoitaa satoja avun tarpeessa olevia elaimia.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Palomies Ricky on pelastanut palavasta rakennuksesta burmanpythonin. Kellarin muokkaaminen valtaisaksi kaarmemaailmaksi on yksi Antonion kaikkien aikojen suurimmista hankkeista.

programme.title: Shark Week Immersion
programme.desc: Syvyystiimi vastaa haikaloja koskeviin kysymyksiin laidasta laitaan. Popkulttuurin historiasta nostetaan esiin kuuluisia haikohtauksia ja niita kokeillaan tosielamassa.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa parjaaminen riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Varomattoman metsastajan ampumista valtatiella tutkitaan. Poliisit tarkkailevat kahdesta laittomasta peurankaadosta epailtya miesta. Ankanmetsastajia kuulustellaan hairinnasta.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat tutkivat uutta teoriaa Skotlannin Loch Nessin hirviosta. Olento voi olla paitsi todellinen, myos mahdollisesti vaarallisempi kuin on edes kuviteltu.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Pojat navigoivat Meksikossa krokotiilien ja hyttysten piinaamien vesivaylien ja laguunien kautta kohti tarpooni-kalojen paratiisia.

programme.title: Hirvio sisallani
programme.desc: Miehelle nousee tuskallinen ihottuma. Nainen karsii pistavista kipukohtauksista kurkussaan. Teinia vaivaavat selittamaton pyorrytys ja vasymys.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Howie Mandel tilaa uuden akvaarion, talla kertaa yllatykseksi agenttinsa yritykselle. Jo olemassa oleva akvaario tarvitsee paivitysta.

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Dokumentaarisessa sarjassa seurataan Houstonin elainsuojeluyhdistyksen tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elainten hyvaksi.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elaman jano. Sarjassa seurataan Miami-Daden poliisilaitoksen elainpalveluyksikon tutkijoita taistelussa elaimiin kohdistuvaa julmuutta vastaan.

programme.title: Shark Week Immersion
programme.desc: Syvyystiimi vastaa haikaloja koskeviin kysymyksiin laidasta laitaan. Popkulttuurin historiasta nostetaan esiin kuuluisia haikohtauksia ja niita kokeillaan tosielamassa.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Police officers form a human chain as they attempt the dramatic rescue of a family of four during Tropical Storm Imelda, which unleashed record-breaking floods on Texas. A hike goes horribly wrong in Hawaii, when a sightseer slips.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: In Slovakia, Joanna traces Danube tributaries up to the top of the snow-capped Tatras. In Budapest she explores the river by boat and rides a unique childrens railway, as well as discovering the citys Jewish heritage.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans take advantage of a brief reprieve from Dark Winters wrath.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to Northumberland where he meets Kezz and Nathalie Petronelli-Stone. Their off-grid and environmentally sensitive approach to life means they dont even have a telly.

programme.title: Truth About Takeaways
programme.desc: We Brits now eat 3 million takeaways a day. But what are they doing to us? Journalist Nikki Fox teams up with scientists at Liverpool John Moores University to run a unique experiment. 15 volunteers eat nothing but takeaways for two weeks and undergo a barrage of tests, from blood sugar and body fat to gut bacteria and mental sharpness.

programme.title: Freeze the Fear with Wim Hof
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series, the celebrities try to freeze their fear and complete the ultimate challenge of jumping from a 500ft high bridge. 6/6

programme.title: Asia: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at this dazzling exploration of Earths biggest and most varied continent, Asia.

programme.title: Asia: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at this dazzling exploration of Earths biggest and most varied continent, Asia.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Police officers form a human chain as they attempt the dramatic rescue of a family of four during Tropical Storm Imelda, which unleashed record-breaking floods on Texas. A hike goes horribly wrong in Hawaii, when a sightseer slips.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joanna heads towards the Danube Delta, one of the last great wilderness areas remaining in Europe, full of birdlife including the majestic Pelican. At the mouth of the river, on Romanias Black Sea coast, Joanna bids farewell to the Danube and reflects on her amazing journey.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben begins his travels in the remote Wilderness Island, off Australias north-western cape, to meet a man whose story is as remarkable as the landscape he inhabits.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Spring is coming to Alaska and the break up of the Yukon river brings the threat of flooding, the challenge of reaching fresh water and a teaching opportunity for a man and his young children.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman investigate the origins and production of more household staples, beginning with tea. Gregg looks at the factory that produces one quarter of all the tea drunk in Britain. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey examines an African tea processing plant, and Ruth Goodman sheds light on how Second World War troops risked their lives to brew up

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: Asias jungles are exceptionally diverse, but whilst they provide shelter, food and opportunity, they are also full of dangers and hidden threats. In monsoon forests, tigers tenaciously hunt their prey, and prehistoric-looking rhinos play courtship games akin to kiss-chase. In tropical rainforests, female orangutans must search far and wide to find their perfect mates. And in the little-known forests of Iraqi Kurdistan, a new Persian leopard population is growing amid minefields.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: Tornadoes are among the most powerful forces on earth. With swirling winds of more than 300 miles per hour, and the strength to destroy nearly everything in their path, they account for an average of 60 deaths and millions of dollars in property damage every year.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: In this episode about how to stay healthy on the inside, Michael meets an 86-year-old cyclist with the immune system of a 30-year-old. He also discovers the benefits of Tai Chi towards losing weight.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley travels across two of the most enigmatic countries in the Caribbean - Cuba and Haiti. Joanna kicks off her adventure in the back of a classic car in Havana, outlining her 1500-mile Caribbean adventure.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue builds a chicken coop in the hopes of creating a reliable source of protein. Jessie hikes up to his favourite fishing lake and Ricko discovers a not-so-friendly animal on camp.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads to the azure seas and pine-covered mountains of Canada, where artistic couple Catherine and Wayne live on a floating island they built themselves - a home they share with seals, eagles, bears and chihuahuas!

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: In the planets most densely populated continent, animals live at extremely close quarters with people, from tigers making a home in town to elephants stopping traffic for food.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is at the worlds largest dried pasta factory in Italy where they produce 150,000 kilometres of spaghetti each day. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey is discovering why the best pasta is made with durum wheat, and Ruth Goodman discovers that the product arrived in Britain much earlier than many would imagine

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans test their will and luck against Dark Winters obstacles.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle journeys to the mountains of central Portugal, to live with Alex, a British man who traded in his lucrative retail career for his own mountainside hideaway. Later, Ben lollipops trees to protect them from forest fires.

programme.title: Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Certified indoorsman Phil Wang convinces best friend Pierre Novellie - also not much better at outdoor stuff - to join him in Africas Kingdom in the Sky. 3/8

programme.desc: A recent report published by NOAA and NASA con rmed that 2010 to 2019 was the hottest decade since record keeping began 140 years ago. In July of 2018, new temperature records were set around the world and Death Valley experienced the hottest month ever recorded on earth. 2/8

programme.desc: Before leaving Cuba, Joanna gets as close as possible to Guantanamo Bay, before taking a short boat trip to Haiti, a nation born from slave revolution with a strong tradition of voodoo.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: From Alaskas north to its southern tip, Alaskans improvise as essential gear breaks down.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Adventurer Ben Fogle journeys to North Africa, to live with American widow Maryanne Stroud Gabbani (67) - on the farm shes built on the edge of the Sahara.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: In the heart of Asia lie vast arid lands. These deserts and dry grasslands are so hostile, they push life to the limit. The animals that live here are some of the earths toughest.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg visits Europes largest biscuit factory in London where they produce 80 million biscuits every day. Following the production of chocolate digestives, he discovers that the biscuits are shaped by a bronze roller and that the chocolate is actually added to the bottom of the biscuits.

His competitors are Toby (Prince Svans squire); Maggie (Jezabels squire); Gnaomi (a thinly disguised Sassy Gnome) and Ducky! Berts devotion to Prince Ivandoe eventually wins him the coveted Golden Grooming Brush. Unfortunately for Ivandoe, it also wins Bert his freedom.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Sarah is intensely following Gumball and Darwin around trying to win their friendship. When Gumball tells her that she is acting like a stalker, she embraces it and actually takes it up a notch. However, when Gumball and Darwin realise that shes behaving this way because shes lonely, they go to surprising lengths to make her feel accepted.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Sarah is intensely following Gumball and Darwin around trying to win their friendship. When Gumball tells her that she is acting like a stalker, she embraces it and actually takes it up a notch. However, when Gumball and Darwin realise that shes behaving this way because shes lonely, they go to surprising lengths to make her feel accepted.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. The new Coach witnesses Jamie bullying the other kids at lunch and steps in. Jamie is made to apologise, much to the amazement of the other kids. Gumball and Darwin worry about Jamie seeking revenge, especially when they see him sneaking into the back of Coachs car. They use their newly acquired gym skills to save the Coach from being bullied.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Poison Ivy uses a rare pollen-spewing flower to put all of Gotham to sleep, its up to Bibi to save her friends and save the day. / Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museum’s famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves dancing. The only Mushable she hasn’t danced with is Amanita. But Amanita doesn’t dance. Can Lilit get her dancing?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Miff has a blast playing a game with our Mushlers -- one that Fung refused to play. Now Fung worries that he has lost his best friend, and so tries to win her back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To prove to everyone that he does not make cooking mistakes, Sushi-Mushi revisits his chef training. But what he really needs training in, is admitting mistakes!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is finding getting some "alone time" to herself tricky. So when she finds an old shell to hang out in the forest, she is rapt and doesnt want to share it.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie starts coaching Sumush to become fitter, faster, stronger, it unleashes a new Mushpie: one who demands excellence and full commitment! Poor Sumush!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a ‘forest song’, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: The crew plays hide-and-seek at headquarters, and Tweety is the seeker.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger’s collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages a space station.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Fung and Miff have come across a rare piece of bark struck by lightning.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep knows so many things about nature that Mush-Mush and Lilit are confident he’s not far from being an expert like Mushpot.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has been watching Sushi-Mushi test new compost fritters recipes. When Mush-Mush gets to taste one, he can’t believe it: Sushi-Mushi has cooked the perfect fritter.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to impress the Mushlets by showing off his sensing gift. But his sense-foot doesn’t work like it should. This is a disaster! And when Mushpot explains that some Mushables have to wait until they become Mushups to see their gifts fully developed, Mush-Mush is frustrated. He wants to master his gift now! Mush-Mush discovers that the solution he’s looking for might be in The Dark Dark Forest. Mush-Mush decides to take his friends Chep and Lilit on a little trip...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her… Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.desc: Squirm and Manny thrill us with some spooky dance moves!

programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes, although Daphne’s more focused on nailing Fred with a revenge snowball. Their snowy fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes, but the fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname "Tough Buff." But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs, Lola, Daffy, Porky and Tweety utilise their vehicles to tackle construction projects, all the while acquiring valuable insights.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France where they are encouraged to make their design bigger and more fun.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean settles in for dinner and TV, but his cozy night ends in chaos when a spring-loaded sofa launches him out of relaxation—and off his seat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput has escaped yet again, and yet again, Specs and Skinny are in serious trouble with the Boss. He’s so fed up with their constant failure that he hires an out-of-towner: a super cool, hi-tech Doc who has all the moves and the attitude to match. The new guy’s hip to all of Lamput’s tricks, and before long, the shape shifting blob is safely back at the Lab. Specs and Skinny, robbed of their whole gig, end up on the streets, while Rival Doc gets all the glory. With glory comes blame, though, and when Lamput stages yet another signature crafty escape, the Boss turns all his fury on Rival Doc. Who hired this guy, anyway!? Lamput just wants things to be how they were. The orange blob helps the Docs get back their jobs at the Lab, Rival Doc is sent packing, and Lamput prepares yet another daring escape.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its a night out at the theatre for the Docs but when they spot Lamput in the front row, they decide to give up their night of culture for a night of capture! Lamput escapes backstage where he morphs from scenery into props, then into costume and eventually ends up on stage! The Docs make chase, and end up becoming part of the performance too, much to the Directors dismay. Can the show go on? Or will it be a total flop?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs spot Lamput in the audience of a magic show and try to catch him. The chase takes them backstage where Lamput evades the Docs with the help of different magic contraptions until Specs and Skinny unknowingly ends up on stage. They become reluctant assistants to the Magician who is about to perform some death-defying tricks – with the help of the Docs!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike hasnt been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spikes a sore loser. Thats why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the "sore" into "sore loser" by biting Toms finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc…). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spikes right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just cant win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry each build their own booby-trapped bunker.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While using a wand to make inanimate objects come to life to attack Jerry, Tom accidentally zaps a marionette.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: It’s summer and Spike’s the primary beneficiary of Rick’s daily grilling ritual; the pooch is tossed a nice juicy T-bone nightly. When Spike gets stuck trying to exit the doghouse, he realizes it’s time to back off the beef. Spike orders Tom to hide the tempting T-bones and no matter what he says or does don’t let him have them! Of course it’s a lose-lose scenario for Tom; Spike becomes angry if Tom caves in to his demands and gives him the steaks and even angrier if he doesn’t! When Jerry moves one of the nightly T-bones from Tom’s latest hiding place, it begets a series of unfortunate events when Spike’s hunger becomes too much and he demands Tom give him his steak back! Jerry enjoys the show and the food (cat and mouse dinner theater). In the end, Spike loses the extra weight from chasing Tom. When Jerry can’t fit in his mouse hole because of the weight he’s gained justice is served!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Little Quacker is heartsick and hes come to the cat and mouse detective to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quackers honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and hes counting on the cat and mouse detective to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry arent about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cats Meow Dance Competition is coming up and Toodles dance partner has gone missing! In the meantime, Toodles needs a new dance partner in case hers doesnt turn up. Butch and Tom go toe-to-toe for the honor. But when Tom manages to nab the spot, he winds up disappearing, too! Now its up to Jerry to solve the case!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he causes the Batwing to crash, Bam becomes obsessed with making it up to her during a high-stakes aerial mission against Penguin and his giant ducky blimp.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De gang gaat naar een festival voor de Dag van de Doden. Daar komen ze erachter dat de geest van een oude legendarische crimineel, El Bandito, is teruggekeerd om de bevolking angst aan te jagen. Fred raakt geobsedeerd met het mysterie en wil onderdeel van de legende worden.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to watch her friends kid, Wayne, and convinces Fred to take a night off from mysteries to go to the boardwalk amusement park. Unbeknownst to her, though, the park is being haunted by a fiendish clown, Madcap.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are starving for their reserves are depleted and their fishing has been unsuccessful. Fortunately, a truck delivers a crate of edibles to the research station that contains compact food cubes. When placed under a special light beam, the cubes retransform into delicious meals. Grizzy discovers that the decompressing lamp can, conversely, compact organic elements too. For example, the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A snowstorm rips the solar panels off the log cabin and Grizzy can no longer watch TV or enjoy the comforts of home! But he has a brilliant idea. He produces electricity by making a caribou run on a treadmill, using the last carrot in the house as bait. But the Lemmings absolutely want his carrot to make the perfect snowman.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-l’oeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where they’d hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzy’s TV. But it doesn’t take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: it’s an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Ranger’s cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzy’s feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.desc: Tom must compete with his American cousin for the right to remain a Butler at Postlewaite manor.

programme.desc: When Tom inadvertently set a Yeti loose on the town Jerry Van Mouseling must subdue the beast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a re-match.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remote-controlled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a life-sized rolling ball game. Grizzy, who in inclined to seasickness, tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed during his nap by flies buzzing incessantly around his head. When he realizes that the carnivorous plant upon which the Lemmings are playing rodeo feeds off flying insects, he decides to confiscate it and use it as an anti-fly weapon.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans

programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean discovers he has a doppelganger: Mr. Pod. They wear the same clothes and look exactly alike. Unfortunately, it all goes wrong when his girlfriend, Irma, thinks that Mr. Pod is much more handsome than Bean.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. programme.desc: A music video of Daffy Duck using his dump truck to haul supplies and goof around on the job.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.
