programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories don’t always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers lead Sushi-Mushi to believe that Pickled Swampost is Mushpot’s favourite dish when he cant stand it. Now they must try to stop Sushi-Mushi from serving this horrible food to Mushpot!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes don’t listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: It’s Christmas Eve, and Fred is ready to solve a Christmas mystery! Unfortunately, the town the gang has arrived in is being attacked by a Pterodactyl, and it doesn’t seem to have anything to do with Christmas!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar Ierland om het oude kasteel van de Blake-familie te bezoeken. Terwijl de gang onder de indruk raakt van het smaragden eiland, worden ze gedwongen te heroverwegen hoe geweldig de oude mythes en legendes daadwerkelijk zijn door een ontmoeting met een verwoestende reus.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China, but the crew faces a major setback and Bugs worries about letting down his favourite chef.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critter’s arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In a dark corner of the attic full of cobwebs, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to “irreconcilable differences”. For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesn’t like change; it’s like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamput’s perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously that’s the real enemy.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After repeated failures, the Docs finally realized what they were lacking: a good moustache! With their powerful facial hair, they are now unstoppable!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Boss and the Docs chase Lamput all the way into outer space! On the moon, Lamput discovers that aliens may be plotting to destroy Earth! He seeks the Docs for help.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: it’s been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick’s required not to eat or drink for 12 hours.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms being unusually difficult when hes rocked by an epiphany -- hes losing his hair! Paranoid hes going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom’s hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case he’s sent to recover at the local animal hospital.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame. Unable to remove it, deal with the emotional shame, or adapt to the giant plastic funnel on his head, Tom must find meaning in the suffering.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerry’s home, his home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Toms bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestah’s insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes on a camping trip, although they cant really agree on why. Freds desire for the gang to get in touch with their natural instincts and hones their mystery skills, turns into on-the-job training as Viking Ghosts attack and attempt to drive them away – or worse.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred staat terecht, veroordeeld voor het brein achter alle mysteries die hij heeft opgelost. Met de hulp van zijn advocaat, Daphne, gaan ze terug naar de gebeurtenissen van de dag in een stad die sinds de jaren 1950 was verlaten vanwege een giftige chemische lekkage waar een toxische mutant iedereen die in de buurt van de stad komt geterroriseert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls almost instantaneously: just put an object inside their shell and it’s automatically coated with mother-of-pearl The game of marbles that the Lemmings have invented with pearls is driving Grizzy crazy. He manages to catapult the Lemmings far away. But at the ocean bottom, they discover a giant oyster. All they need to create a giant-scale marble game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have adopted a small exotic fish that’s lively and affectionate and have fun decorating its aquarium. Jealous, Grizzy finds a fish too, but his is expressionless and indifferent to the bear’s efforts to communicate. Grizzy plots to exchange the two fish behind the Lemmings backs. He puts the affectionate fish in an even bigger aquarium with a pharaonic decor and locks the lid. But the Lemmings have no intention of leaving their friend to Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings use all the cans and tins they can get their hands on to build a beach slide. Grizzy, annoyed at not finding his tinned fish to prepare his meal tray, recovers them from the Lemmings. In their struggle, Grizzy loses his badge! Grizzy and the Lemmings now fight over a valuable metal detector that each party needs to accomplish their goal: build a slide or find the beloved badge.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take a liking to an endangered crab on the beach and decide to shelter it from a seagull who is using its shell to open coconuts. They bring it home to a disgruntled Grizzy, who wants to watch TV in peace while snacking on Cheetos. When the Lemmings turn into full-fledged crab rescuers, the house is soon overrun with crustaceans. Grizzy decides to use the seagull to get rid of the crabs. But the Lemmings - ready to do anything to protect their new friends - embark the entire house, like a raft on water.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings’ boat, he could come closer to a zone that’s teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owner’s ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance that’s even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The neighbors cat turns out to be a hipster whose laidback attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed, Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry battles Tom to save a crab from becoming the Duke and Duchesss main course.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After taking the heat again from Ginger for Jerrys shenanigans, fed up Tom decides to pack his bags and go home to his birth family. But can you ever really go home again?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired by Dixie Wolf to find all the sheep that have gone missing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Frankenstein turns Tom into a colossus and Tom ends up terrorizing the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling saves the day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A guilty conscience causes Butch to change his ways. But Tom Jerry Spike and Tuffy quickly decide they like the old Butch better.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms assigned laundry duty at the estate and Jerrys determined to soil the job.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom finds himself trapped inside a Catsylvania bedtime story and fleeing from a furious Jabberwock.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After discovering a gray hair, Spikes decides hes too old to be the alpha of the house which sends Tom into full bully mode. Jerry will have to act fast to convince Spike hes still the alpha dog.

programme.desc: Teddy is at the dry cleaners and Mr Bean is feeling lonely. Then he finds a new friend: a goldfish in the pond. Bean has a great time with his new friend, until he discovers that not all fish in the sea are such sweethearts.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. But when he needs to use the bat-o-flage and become invisible, hell have to learn that doing good is its own reward.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Take to the skies over Gotham with Batwing and her friend best jet-friend Goldie the Arrowplane!

programme.desc: Pro snowboarder Pepper Polar Bear hires The Looney Builders to build a ski resort. Pepper soon learns that others have different skill levels. / The Looney Builders are hired to build a rollercoaster for Looneyburg.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Exasperated by the Lemmings who prevent him from watching his favorite TV show in peace, Grizzy catapults them out of the cabin. One of them passes through the northern lights and undergoes a strange mutation: he now has the power to control metal with his mind.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Woken with a start by a nightmare filled with Lemmings, Grizzy stumbles on the Rangers dream machine. Its a headphone set where you can program the theme of your choice before falling asleep within seconds for a night filled with sweet dreams. But who could possibly sleep soundly surrounded by Lemmings who want their fair share too?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto an old American India medallion bearing the symbol of the wind. He who wears it has the power to command air streams. Grizzy would be quite content to never leave the sofa again and control things from a distance, but the Lemmings want it to create fantastic new games that literally blow you away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. It soars off, leaving a rainbow-colored streak in its wake. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for his beloved she-bear, while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo on a bucking unicorn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for she-bear while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput escapes the Lab and the unenviable task of orange-blob-retrieval falls to Specs and Skinny. The Boss equips them with increasingly expensive vehicles. The real issue might be staffing.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput has escaped yet again, and yet again, Specs and Skinny are in serious trouble with the Boss. He’s so fed up with their constant failure that he hires an out-of-towner: a super cool, hi-tech Doc who has all the moves and the attitude to match. The new guy’s hip to all of Lamput’s tricks, and before long, the shape shifting blob is safely back at the Lab. Specs and Skinny, robbed of their whole gig, end up on the streets, while Rival Doc gets all the glory. With glory comes blame, though, and when Lamput stages yet another signature crafty escape, the Boss turns all his fury on Rival Doc. Who hired this guy, anyway!? Lamput just wants things to be how they were. The orange blob helps the Docs get back their jobs at the Lab, Rival Doc is sent packing, and Lamput prepares yet another daring escape.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to “irreconcilable differences”. For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesn’t like change; it’s like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamput’s perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously that’s the real enemy.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Locked up in the back of a police van is a great opportunity to reminisce about where it all went wrong. The Docs ponder their shared childhood at "Lab School".

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. It’s really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, let’s face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport – she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - don’t worry, we’ll have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irma’s brochure – a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover however, that Velma lacks the skill set to make her a popular politician.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Scooby Gang enter Dickens classic ?A Christmas Carol?, as they try to get to the bottom of the mysterious ghost tormenting Scrooge in 1843 England. Unfortunately, the Ghosts begin to convince Velma shes on a disastrous path of her own.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An evil ringmaster recruits Tom to help him snare the Catsylvania mice.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerrys antics unearth an autographed baseball – a childhood souvenir of Ricks – he warns Tom to keep his paws off it, or else! Tom attempts to obey, but Jerrys got other ideas and the ball gets out of hand. The guys chase the treasured ball all over the neighborhood, recovering it only to lose it again. And again. And again.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A robot turns from friend to foe, forcing Tom, Jerry, Spike and Tuffy to team up in order to rid themselves of the invader.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry fight each other with the balloons that Rick has placed all over the house to surprise Ginger on their anniversary.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom must cut fire wood for the Manor fireplaces while Jerry harasses him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. He will finally be able to rid of the Lemmings, without even leaving the couch!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have invented a new popcorn game which consists of throwing popcorn and catching it with their mouths. Grizzy notices that his lovely she-bear seems to be drawn by the scent of the grilled corn and decides to invite her over for a snack, just the two of them. But first, he must quickly recover the popcorn from the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear hes in love with, for she truly adores this rhythm. He finds a learning kit at the rangers home which has a dance carpet with footprints that light up in rhythm. The only problem is that Lemmings want the ghetto-blaster to continue their rave party to an entirely different beat.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks hes a rodent! He tries to get the gang to adopt him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied "break dance" the Lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, its panic all round! Grizzy is determined to eliminate the parasites, down to the very last one. The problem is his little roommates have no desire whatsoever to be treated...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Another heat wave: even the riverbed is dried up. One very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the Lemmings have used the last remaining bottles of water to fill their inflatable pool. He has no intention of letting the Lemmings swim in what might very well be his last chance to quench his thirst.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Witch Hazel hires The Looney Builders to make her house look spooky for Halloween, but things get complicated when they use her off-limits magical things.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a giant water slide for Looneyburgs waterpark. He keeps adding onto the design with the support of Bugs until problems arise.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Its Tazs birthday, and the Looney Builders decide to build him a huge ice cream sundae. Porky, however, is paranoid about little mistakes causing delays which could result in the ice cream melting.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders race against the clock to build Cecil Turtle a new racetrack. Daffy gets caught up in his own desire to race and changes part of the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: George P. Mandrake hires The Looney Builders to build a T. Rex fossil. / Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestah’s insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman – and the mission – are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast! But when the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbird’s beach day plans, Bam helps him realize that even though things didn’t go exactly as planned, they still had a great day!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry zip along Singapores vibrant riverside and make a new friend – Merli! Will Merli succeed in being the maestro of peace between the two?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Bolly can take a break and head off to have fun, our Mushlers insist that they will do all the repairs around Mushton for him. Now Bolly needs to fix all their repairs!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone realizes that they dont actually know what Fung and Miffs special gifts are! So Puff and our Mushlers set out to try and find out without Fung and Miff knowing.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has created a cloak out of a leaf, and Chanterelle thinks its super fashionable. But when she makes a similar cloak to Cheps, a fashion rivalry is born!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To finally bring life-long friends Mushpot and Starmush back together, Truff goes to help Starmush succeed at an impossible challenge set by Musho…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie gets sick, our Mushlers find it impossible to believe that she turns into the most demanding Mushable ever. Well, theyre about to find out that its all true!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Fung finds out that to earn a delicious treat from Sushi-Mushi you just need to look after the Food Snail for him. No problem! Actually, it becomes a huge problem for Fung!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: "play," "pause" and "fast forward" to living beings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Bolly hurts his foot and can’t go fast until it heals. Phooey! But when everyone gives him treats to cheer him up, Bolly decides he never wants his foot to heal.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is over-joyed when his weevil friend, Chase, returns to Mushton. But Chase seems to have changed, hes way harder to handle now. And he wants something from Chep! But what?

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.title: Euroopan rajavartijat
programme.desc: Tulli tutkii Brysselissa haisevaa ruokasailiota. Mies epaonnistuu yrityksessaan salakuljettaa tupakkaa Roomaan.

programme.title: Euroopan rajavartijat

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers: Unelma-autot
programme.desc: Autokauppiasvirtuoosi Mike Brewer ja mekaanikko Marc "Elvis" Priestley vaihtavat klassiseen maastoautoon, Series 2A Land Roveriin, joka tulee entiselle sotilaalle, Tonylle.

programme.title: Bitchin Rides

Lasten kisaillessa kuumailmapalloillaan Candace paattaa ottaa rennosti ja luopuu tavoitteestaan nalkittaa pojat. Myohemmin han oppii olemaan sisukkaampi. Tohtori Tollontyo rakentaa dronttinaattorin ja uhkaa paastaa valloilleen pelottavan dronttilintuarmeijansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat biosfaarin, jossa Isabella ja muuta partiotytot voivat hankkia ansiomerkkeja. Silla valin Candace pohtii, miksi Jeremy tykkaa hanesta ja tri Tollontyo ottaa kayttoon Sadenaattorinsa. / Candace lupaa Stacylle viettaa paivan taman kanssa ilman Jeremya, mutta yllattaen Jeremy tarttuu kiinni hanen kylkeensa. Han syyttaa veljiaan ja yrittaa saada nama irrottamaan Jeremyn samalla kun han itse yrittaa piilotella tata Stacylta. Samaan aikaan Isabella tahtoisi paasta viettamaan aikaa kahdestaan Finiaksen kanssa, mutta tama jahtaa ystavineen jattilaisrobottikoiraa ympari kaupunkia.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat valtavan terashain Danvillen vuosittaisia Satamapaivia varten, mutta Candace on jalleen paattanyt karayttaa heidat. Stacyn ja kapteeni Tihrun avustamana Candace lahtee metsastamaan haita ja veljiaan. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo onnistuu sotkemaan itsensa Suolavesitoffeennaattoriinsa. / Finias ja Ferb saavat selville, etta Kuun heikompi painovoima tekee jaatelosta erityisen hyvaa, joten he lastaavat raketin tayteen lehmia ja lentavat Kuuhun testaamaan teoriaa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo hyokkaa naapurinsa parvekekasvien kimppuun Kosteusimunaattorillaan ja Stacy auttaa Candacea kokkaamaan Jeremylle romanttisen aterian.

Silla valin majuri Sahkeinen ja Karl arvioivat Perryn toimintaa agenttina ja tri Tollontyo kay lapi vanhoja keksintojaan selvittaakseen miksi ne ovat epaonnistuneet.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb haluavat yllattaa aitinsa ja rakentavat supertietokoneen selvittaakseen, mika ilahduttaisi hanta eniten. / Finias ja Ferb muuttavat kotinsa hupitaloksi ystaviensa avustuksella. Samaan aikaan tavallinen vesinokkaelain on karannut elaintarhasta ja majuri Sahkeinen lahettaa epahuomiossa sen taistelemaan Tollontyota vastaan.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace hukkaa kannykkansa ja rikkoo sitten aidilta saamansa uuden kannykan, han pelkaa joutuvansa pulaan. Mutta Finias ja Ferb korjaavat puhelimen ja lisaavat siihen runsaasti uusia toimintoja. Candace on tyytyvainen – kunnes puhelin telesiirtaa hanet Paasiaissaarille! Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa Noutonaattorin. / Isa katselee lapsuutensa lempisarjaa, mutta television taikamattoajelu ei veda vertoja ajan kultaamille muistoille. Siispa Finias ja Ferb paattavat tehda hanelle oikean lentavan maton. Silla valin Candace yrittaa ennustaa tulevaisuutta onnenkeksien avulla ja tohtori Tollontyo on varastanut hankalasti puhdistettavia aineita Tahranaattoriaan varten.

programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace pilaa kampauksensa juuri ennen Jeremyn aidin jarjestamaa hyvantekevaisyysgaalaa, han joutuu turvautumaan Finiaksen ja Ferbin apuun. Han ei kuitenkaan noudata poikien ohjeita ja on pian kokonaan karvan peitossa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo on rakentanut Tosi-Pahanaattorin ja odottaa innolla, etta paasee nakemaan, mita se tekee. / On Danvillen vuosittaisten lihamurekefestivaalien aika ja aiti paasee toimimaan mureketuomarina. Kun Buford rikkoo festivaalien pomppulinnan, Finias ja Ferb rakentavat jattilaislinnan sen tilalle. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo, joka on paattanyt voittaa murekekilpailun, kayttaa Madattajanaattoria pilatakseen muiden kilpailijoiden murekkeet.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Esihistorian hamarissa luolapojat Finias ja Ferb keksivat ensin pyoran ja sitten ensimmaisen auton. Candace yrittaa tietenkin karayttaa veljiaan ja keksii vahingossa samalla tulen. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa alkukantaisen naattorin, jonka avulla han pyrkii viemaan asuinpaikan kehittyneemmilta lajitovereiltaan. / 1500-luvun Kiinassa pahamaineinen rosvopaallikko Tollokaani kaappaa hallitsijan tyttaren, prinsessa Isabellan. Finias, Ferb, Buford ja Baljeet lahtevat etsimaan nokkaelainmestari Perrya Jyrkimman Jyrkkyyden Jyrkkavuorelta pelastaakseen prinsessan.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun aiti tarjoutuu viettamaan koko paivan Candacen kanssa, tama on varma, etta paasee viimein karayttamaan veljensa – mutta he eivat teekaan mitaan mielenkiintoista! Perry epailee tohtori Tollontyon liittyvan asiaan ja paatyy avustamaan perivihollistaan. / Candace pyytaa, etta Stacy hypnotisoi hanet, niin etta han voi nauttia treffeista Jeremyn kanssa miettimatta veljiensa karayttamista. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo menettaa muistinsa uusimman naattorinsa takia ja Norm kayttaa tilaisuutta hyvakseen teeskennellakseen hanen poikaansa.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Koerte suureparane lõhnataju on inimestele palju abiks. Sisekaitseakadeemia teenistuskoerte koolituskeskuses on kaimas põnev uuring, mis aitab veelgi paremini mõista ja rakendada koera teravat nina narkootiliste ainete leidmiseks. Eesti looduse uheks rikkuseks on meie meresaarte rohkus ja tõelise saarefanni Kadri Alleri eesmark on kaia neist võimalikult paljudel. Naine, kelle kogemustepagasis on juba enam kui saja Eesti saare kulastus, võtab meid kaasa retkele Vareslaiule. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Petra uritab Felicianot umber veenda. Markii kutsub Curro endaga arireisile. Manuel ei mõista Jimena kaitumist. Simona poeg teatab peatsest saabumisest.

programme.title: Sunnuntailounas
programme.desc: Tauno viib lapsed oma vanemate hauale Mantsalas, et neilt andeks paluda. Jani saab haid uudiseid. Taavi jaab tootuks ja Eevi hakkab kohtamas kaima.

programme.title: Estraadisangarid
programme.desc: Tihti on arvatud, et meie popmuusika parimate laulukirjutajate looming oleks võinud omal ajal jõuda maailmakaardile, ent jai toppama raudse eesriide taha. Raimond Valgre, Arne Oit, Valter Ojakaar, Kustas Kikerpuu ja Uno Loop on vaid mõned nimed meie armastatuimate heliloojate nimistus, kelle aegumatud viisid labisid 2016. aastal enneolematu varskenduskuuri, et saada uus võimalus! Verivarske dokumentaalsari „Estraadisangarid” jalgib meie levimuusika kullaprooviga laulude elulugu ja teekonda nende sunnist kuni 21. sajandi eredasse punktvalgusesse. Autorid Roald Johannson ja Jaak Kilmi. Tana on Raimond Valgre 112. sunniaastapaev.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Sisi suudab parast rahutut ood veenda oma rivaal Georgi austama Possenhofeni palee võiduajamise kokkulepet ning Ludovika kardab, et Sisi saab jalile tema kaua hoitud saladusele.

Kuigi "Laine" oli ulipopulaarne juba paris 60. aastate alguses, siis teletahistaevasse tõusis ta parast 1966. aastal valminud filmi "Neli blondi ja neli brunetti". Filmi režissooriks oli Astrid Lepa. Stuudios on loomulikult ka mõned blondid ja brunetid. Saatejuht Reet Linna, režissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Evelin saabub koju pomm-uudisega – tema kavatseb teha Mornaase oma moeari. Samal ajal ullatavad Henry ja Maria teda vastu, nimelt on noorpaar koos lastega end Evelini majja sisse seadnud. Taivo ja Anneli naudivad samuti kooselu. Alma, Laine ja Allan kiruvad maksutõuse. Siim ja Iiris planeerivad pulmi.

programme.title: Mullist valja
programme.desc: Anastassia ja Grigori liiguvad rindejoonele uha lahemale. Venemaa pidevate runnakute all elavates kulades on elu raske, kuid inimeste kaitsetahe pusib kõrge, kuna neil on varskelt meeles, meid kulastanud "Vene maailma" hirmuteod. Teekond viib meid ohtlikele radadele, kuna verejanuline vaenlane on meist vaid mõne kilomeetri kaugusel.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Intervjuu aastast 2020, kui Rein Jarlik tahistas 85. sunnipaeva. Legendaarset Eesti Televisiooni saatejuhti ja 20. augusti klubi liiget kusitles Aivi Parijõgi. Tana on Rein Jarlikul 90. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: Viru. Vabaduse saatkond
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilm uhe erakordse ehitise ajaloost. Viru hotell on midagi enamat kui lihtsalt hoone - see on monument ja ikoon. Hotelli sisemus peidab endas lugusid nendest, kes seda maja ehitasid ja kes on seal viibinud. Film vaatleb Viru hotelli fenomeni, poliitilist tahtsust ja margilist tahendust. Sõna saavad Sofi Oksanen, Maimu Berg, Eva Lille, Kuno Plaan jt tuntud inimesed. Juttu tuleb paljudest Viru legendiga seotud tahkudest, muuhulgas ka poliitikast, prostitutsioonist, KGBst, arikatest ja muidugi varieteest. Naeme ohtralt põnevaid arhiivikaadreid, mis mõjuvad kohati nostalgiliselt, aga ka koomiliselt. Intervjueeritavate lood on tais inimlikkust - need on põnevad, traagilised, naljakad ja absurdsed tagasivaated meie kõigi uhisele ajaloole.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Craddock kurameerib oma tantsuõpetajaga, kelle poeg on hoolimatu kihutaja. Bernie sõidab leske lohutama. Vernon ja David otsustavad lord Ashfordly Bentleyd parandada.

programme.title: Ringvaade

programme.title: Tahelepanu! Tegemist on teadusega
programme.desc: Eesti teadlased teevad iga paev avastusi, mis aitavad muuta meie tulevikku targemaks, turvalisemaks ja põnevamaks. Klipisari viib vaataja laboritesse ja katsevaljakutele, kus sunnivad ullatuslikud ideed ja avanevad teadusmaailma salaparased telgitagused. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marit Ummelas.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: "Pealtnagija" on Eesti pikima ajalooga ja teletabelite tipus olev uuriv ajakirjandussaade, mis toob vaatajateni põnevad ja paljastavad lood meie uhiskonna telgitagustest. Lisaks teravatele uurimustele vahendab saade ka haaravaid persoone ja meeldejaavaid reportaaže sundmustest, mille pealtnagijaks tavaline inimene naljalt ei satu. Saatejuhid Mihkel Karmas, Kristjan Pihl, Merilin Parli, Taavi Eilat ja Margit Kilumets. Režissoorid Raivo Maripuu ja Vladlen Pobjaržin, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kõigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kõik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja režissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Saatesari avab erinevaid paevakajalisi teemasid, mis sunnivad meie igapaeva-elust, alates poliitikast ja majandusest, lõpetades sotsiaalia ning kultuuriga. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk, Johannes Tralla, Mirko Ojakivi. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Egon Nuter. Saladus sees
programme.desc: Egon Nuter on Linnateatri kõige vanem naitleja. Ja loomulikult ta kahtleb vahel, kas teda ongi enam kellelegi tarvis. Samas, kupsus sobib Egonile ja ta muutub ajas aina paremaks. Egoni sarmi saladusi avavad tema lahedased, sõber Andrus Vaarik, elukaaslane Liina Tennosaar ja lavastaja Uku Uusberg. Et lugu ei saaks liiga magus ega tõsine, selle eest hoolitseb juubilar ise. Saate autor on Margit Kilumets, režissoor Maire Radsin, assistent Dmitri Hljupin, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske. 23. septembril oli Egon Nuteril 70. sunnipaev.

programme.title: Pea ees vette. Tai Kuningriigis
programme.desc: Uus reisisari, mis jalgib muusikutest abielupaari Piret Jarvis-Milderi ja Egert Milderi ning nende pisitutre Milli seiklusi eksootilises Tais. Egert ja Piret on alati olnud suured reisisõbrad, kes kahe peale kokku pool ilma labi rannanud. Kahe aasta eest liitus nende perega tutar Milli ja moodunud talvel otsustati ette võtta esimene pikem reis kolmekesi. Nii suundutigi neljaks kuuks Taimaale, kus lisaks maailma kaunimatele randadele, rikkalikule kultuurile ja kustumatutele gurmee-elamustele ootas kolmikut ees hulgaliselt seiklusi ning sekeldusi, mis panid peresuhted korralikult proovile. Sarja esimeses osas uudistavad Milderid ringi Tai Kuningriigi kirevas pealinnas Bangkokis. Tootja Kaks Vulkaani OÜ.

programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Craddock kurameerib oma tantsuõpetajaga, kelle poeg on hoolimatu kihutaja. Bernie sõidab leske lohutama. Vernon ja David otsustavad lord Ashfordly Bentleyd parandada.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: 21. juulil 1981. aastal salvestati Prangli saarel esimene saade sarjast "Kodukandilood", režissoor oli Erich Rein. Saatesari sai kiiresti uheks vaadatavamaks Eesti Televisioonis - kulastati ju televaatajate kodukanti, asus see siis millises Eestimaa nurgas iganes. 19. oktoobril 1992 oli eetris sarja sajas saade. Kas tuleb tuttav ette? Saatejuht on Reet Linna, režissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Kotikino esittaa: Evolution
programme.desc: Palkittujen ohjaaja Kornel Mundruczon ja kasikirjoittaja Kata Weberin neljannessa yhteisessa elokuvassa kaydaan lapi perheen historiaa kolmen sukupolven ajalta, surrealistisesta 2. maailmansodan muistosta nykypaivan Berliiniin. Isoaidin sanoinkuvaamaton tuska ja hapea tulevat nakyvaksi Mundruczon elokuvailmaisun ja Weberin henkilokohtaisen kasikirjoituksen kautta, ja vaikka trauman taakka painaa edelleen, perhe katsoo kohti toiveikkaampaa tulevaisuutta.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: The chefs aim for bacon perfection! The appetizer basket includes a Japanese condiment and a bacon-y bar food, with biscuit dough in the entree round.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: Duff Goldmans team and Andrew Fullers team make alien invasion cakes with special effects for judges Amaury Guichon, Sherry Yard and Jack Osbourne. Then, 50 cake fans decide which of the seasons six winning cakes will take home the $40,000 grand prize.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon explores the world of bold and spicy flavors with tangy chicken thighs, an iconic hot sauce and a kicked-up cake.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Its Beer Fest, and Michael Symon serves up porter braised ribs, beer braised potatoes and a fruity rice beer cocktail.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Eddie Jackson partners with Bobbys kryptonite - his daughter, Sophie Flay. Chefs Hari Cameron and Leilani Baugh try to grab victory while Bobby is distracted.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Sunny Anderson and Geoffrey Zakarian come together to escort chefs Paddy Coker and Greg Lutes down the red carpet and snub Bobby Flay along the way.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: The bakers dig deep with buried alive trifles honouring the carnivals failed escape artist and think big for their shrunken head pies.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: The competitors go overboard with gloriously gluttonous food, from fried appetisers to gummy cinnamon roll desserts.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon is all about pork as he fires up the grill for a pork porterhouse, sausage-stuffed peppers, pancetta-loaded greens and a smoky cocktail.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon amps up summer parties with the classic coney dog, barbecue corn ribs and orange strawberry cream pops.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: The Human Ice Pop and sideshow sword swallower inspire the bakers to create treats that melt and a dessert swallowed by another dessert.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated actress Gabourey Sidibe bonds with fellow cat fancier Damaris Phillips as they try to claw their way to victory against Bobby Flay.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Surfs up, but Bobby Flays going down when Jet Tila and Jesse Palmer lead a summertime jam with chefs Demetrius Brown and Pablo Lamon.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy digs into a range of flavour fusions, from a Latin-Asian mashup in Chicago with paella and posole to a Hawaiian spot serving guava ribs and tropical pizza.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Seattle, Guy Fieri visits a funky spot making their name with scratch-made Russian piroshki. Plus, he checks out a place in Kona serving authentic Hawaiian cuisine.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four champions battle for the $25,000 prize. In each round, the ingredient baskets contain delicious reminders of the tournaments culinary themes.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out

Samalla kohenee koko asuinalueen ilme.

programme.desc: 3. kausi alkaa uusintana. Osa 1. Chip ja Joanna Gaines pyorittavat Wacossa, Teksasissa talojen uudistamiseen ja sisustamiseen erikoistunutta Magnolia Homes-yritystaan. Sarjassa seurataan, kuinka rakentamisesta vastaava Chip ja sisustamiseen keskittyva Joanna muokkaavat rapistuneita, mutta runsaasti potentiaalia omaavia taloja edustuskuntoon. programme.title: The Real Housewives Suomi
programme.desc: Marjo uskoutuu Lindalle Flown etkoilla. Mia tavoittelee deittihaasteen voittoa ja hankkii apuvoimia. Satu emannoi ihanaa paivaa luksuskatamaraanilla. Naiset innostuvat yllattavasta kutsusta.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Kausi 7. Jakso 7/10. Maatalon piha moderniksi. Vanhan maatalon piha paivitetaan omistajilleen sopivaksi. Helppohoitoisuuden lisaksi pihaan toivotaan uutta kesakeittiota ja maatrampoliinia. Vanhat perennat saavat vaistya kiveyksen tielta, kun tontilta loytyneista navetan perustuksista muodostuu suunnitelman kivijalka. (41) Ohjelmatekstitys.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Pandoran lippaassa yritetaan kylvaa eripuraa, ja iltaman paatteeksi yksi istuvista menettaa tuolinsa. Viimeiset kaksi istujaa viikon pariseremoniaan selvitetaan kahdessa eri paratiisilajissa.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Sinnikkyytensa seinaistunnassa osoittanut kilpailija saa napata itselleen istumapaikan pariseremoniaan. Kilpailijat laativat uusia strategioita finaaliviikkoa varten, mika saattaa vaikuttaa parivalintoihin ja siihen, kuka joutuu pakkaamaan laukkunsa.

programme.title: Maryn helpot kokkailut
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 5/25. Ruokapreppausta. Mary valmistelee viikon ruoat jaakaappiin ja pakastimeen. Naemme, miten han valmistaa herkullisen papupurjopadan, rapeita lohifileita ja mausteisia kikherneita. Lisaksi Mary tekee ihanan keksitaikinan, jonka voit sailoa pakastimeen odottamaan tuoreiden keksien himoa. Kanadalainen ruokareality.

programme.title: 100 Places to Be
programme.desc: Mihin julkkikset matkustavat, kun he haluavat rentoutua ja karata paparazzeilta? Dokumentti esittelee 100 toistaan upeampaa lomakohdetta ympari maailmaa. Dokumenttisarja.
